articles.author: Dashveenjit Kaur
articles.title: In India, Foxconn is kickstarting production for iPhone 15 - Tech Wire Asia
articles.description: Apple is starting the production of its upcoming iPhone 15 in Tamil Nadu, India, via its manufacturing partner Foxconn.
articles.content:
• Apple is kickstarting the production of its upcoming iPhone 15 in Tamil Nadu, India, via its manufacturing partner Foxconn.
